job_description:
Software Developer

Toronto, ON

Role Summary

The Lead Software Developer will collaborate with our data scientists, engineering, external software design and development teams to create, integrate and maintain Cosm’s proprietary software and digital health products.

They will be responsible for developing and driving our software product vision, design architecture and drive development, coordination of verification, validation and documentation of Cosm software platform, including implementation of secure and compliant (HIPAA) cloud solutions.

Responsibilities

Develop Cosm’s software product pipeline, in coordination with external software teams
Evaluate feasibility through software prototyping
Integrate medical imaging (ultrasound) and colpodynamic imaging (CDI) system into Cosm’s custom software applications
Become familiar with data science algorithm software in the area of segmentation, image and data analysis, database architecture design, and data input / extraction
Integrate data algorithms into Cosm software roadmap for commercialization
Develop and test architectures that enable data extraction and transformation for predictive modeling
Implement and maintain secure and HIPAA compliant cloud hosted software platform, patient-centered digital therapeutics, intelligence and analytics
Create software specifications, establish budget targets, and deliver to meet clinical study and product launch schedules
Lead and/or perform unit testing, software verification and risk analysis
Adhere to all requirements of the Quality Management System

Knowledge, Skills & Abilities

Proven track record in leading successful digital health software development and commercialization, leveraging market insights and user feedback to drive product strategy and growth
Intermediate to senior software developer (.NET, PHP / Laravel and Python) with experience in cloud-based implementation (Azure or AWS)
Medical image processing techniques (e.g., filtering, segmentation, co-registration, spatial transforms)
Previous work experience in data engineering and/or data science (AI/ML)
Knowledge of front-end web frameworks (such as Vue.js) will be an asset
Ability to develop software processes which improve effectiveness and efficiency while meeting quality management system requirements for a medical device manufacturer
Drive cross-functional teams requiring collaborative leadership skills to drive innovation and achieve strategic objectives
Gathers, organizes and presents information in a clear, concise, and compelling manner
Meets commitments on time with effective time management skills

Education And Experience

Bachelor or Master degree in computer science, computer or software engineering, or equivalent
Minimum 5-year experience in image processing and software development related activities in a regulated environment
Experience developing cloud hosted digital healthcare software solutions
Experience in HIPAA / PIPEDA, and cybersecurity
Related experience in building an automated system integrating various software components
Ability to work in a team and communicate effectively
Experience with software risk analysis, and software verification & validation
Understanding of challenges in developing safety critical code and demonstrating requirements traceability
Experience with medical software development under FDA and ISO 13485, and familiarity with HIPAA and IEC 62304 development methodology will be an asset
Passion to contribute to cutting-edge medical device development

Physical Requirements And Environmental Conditions

High-stress and dynamic work environment
Position requires occasional travel in Canada and US
